name: Space Trace
description:
This is a small asteroid like space shooter that i am developing. 

Choose from a few different Ship types and colors.

You fly around trying to destroy as many enemies as possible and getting a good score. Pickup powerups and health boosts on the way to crack your highscore!

There are still Placeholder graphics like the wolrd boundaries but they will obviously be replaced before finishing the game.

Any feedback and/or bug reports  would be awesome, And i hope you have as much fun playing as i had developing!
